pages.text: $(warning) All spells, however, require a special, easy-to-access pouch to be cast from. The Component Pouch is the most basic form of this, with slots for your herbs and a small amount of items.

pages.title: Component Pouch
pages.text: The larger, left side of the pouch can contain any items of your choosing, while the right compartment is used to carry your herbs, ready for casting.
